mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, price, saleStatus) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{saleStatus})
INSERT INTO board_attach (postNum, filename, createdAt) VALUES (#{postNum}, #{filename}, default)
mapper.select: SELECT postNum, writer, title, content, createdAt, price, saleStatus FROM board ORDER BY postNum DESC
SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY postNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}
select filename from board_attach where postNum = #{postNum}
